summary: This is a brief email from June 15, 2021, regarding scheduling a discussion about the Maxwell trial and discovery. It is addressed to a Victim Specialist at the FBI New York field office.

persons.name: Victim Specialist FBI New York
persons.context: The recipient of an email regarding scheduling a discussion about the Maxwell trial and discovery.

keyFacts: The email is dated June 15, 2021, during the period of Ghislaine Maxwell's trial.
The subject matter concerns the Maxwell trial and discovery, indicating ongoing legal proceedings.
The correspondence involves a Victim Specialist at the FBI's New York field office, highlighting victim support services in the case.
